properties.name: data
properties.description: List of notification with key msg.

properties.name: auto-dismiss-msg
properties.description: Set true to Automatically dismiss notification.

properties.name: auto-dismiss-msg-interval
properties.description: Add time interval(in ms) for shown msg.

properties.name: close-on-escape
properties.description: Notification Window  closes on click of Escape Key.

properties.name: background-color
properties.description: background color to the notification window.

properties.name: foreground-color
properties.description: foreground color to the notification window text.
